messages.subject: Humor Me
messages.msgSnippet: Some of you who started out with the Miburo list will recall the Top Ten Reasons to Join the Shinsengumi and the What Saito Would Never Do post from there.
messages.messageBody:
Some of you who started out with the Miburo list will recall the Top
Ten Reasons to Join the Shinsengumi and the What Saito Would Never Do
post from there. Well, we need more of both. I've been chatting with
Barb and I'm going to attempt to come up with some humor stuff for
our website. Those two posts seem like as good a place to start as
any.

Among the other topics I'm considering is some sort of Shinsengumi
Life Lessons category. So yeah, I need input for that as well. If
anyone has anything they want to contribute please post it to the
list or e-mail me ASAP. Thanks.

-MissBehavin (Digging herself deeper into the hole by taking on new
projects.)
